page.title: 08Wadborough Village.
page.content: Wadborough in general is peaceful and quiet. There used to be a chapel in Wadborough. But it has now been built into a house. Some people wanted to make the chapel house into a village hall. The owner offered it for Â£40. But the people would not take it. There is also a level crossing in Wadborough. There is also a pub called the{Masons Arms.}The{Masons Arms}looks quite old and has been decorated. There is a post office aswell. You can buy stamps and sweets there. Apart from the post office there is no other shops in Wadborough. The road with the chapel house and the post office and the{Masons Arms}on is called Station Road. The pub sells meals and drinks and sweets.
